DATASTORE_URL.description: Datastore URL where sites resources are stored.

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Amazom Access Key ID (only needed if the datastore is an S3 bucket)

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Amazom Secret Access Key (only needed if the datastore is an S3 bucket)

STATICD_WILDCARD_DOMAIN.description: Wildcard domain used to generate each site subdomain.

STATICD_ACCESS_ID.description: Access ID used by the API HMAC authentication.

STATICD_SECRET_KEY.description: Secret key used by the API HMAC authentication.

STATICD_HTTP_CACHE.description: Local path where cached resources are stored.
